text: Wind in the Face () is a 1930 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Биография Иосифа ХейфицаВЕТЕР В ЛИЦО It stars Aleksandr Melnikov, Oleg Zhakov, and Zoya Gleizarova. == Actors == * Aleksandr Melnikov as Valerian * Oleg Zhakov as Boris * Zoya Gleizarova as Nina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1930 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi
title: Wind in the Face
